ch0352_00_taro_salon/8201_2001_01_10: Let’s take it easy for a bit.
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
You’re always interacting with so many different
people, [Name:PlayerNickname ]... And I think
that’s a fine idea!
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s have a cute,
fun time today!
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8201_2101_01_10: You can have this if you like!
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8201_2101_02_10:
No need to thank me. If I find anything else I
think you’d like, I’ll be sure to bring it!
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
It’s my way of saying thanks for all the cuteness
you’ve shared with me!
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8201_2103_01_10: Here—have a special present I saved just for you!
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
I’m always happy when someone gives me
something cute.
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
But this time, I got something I thought would make
YOU happy, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I hope
you can use it!
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8201_2201_01_10: Mmhmm... I wonder what we’ll talk about today.
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
There’s so much I’ve been wanting to talk to you
about, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s share all the
cute things we’ve found!
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8201_2302_01_10: Are you sure?! Wow! Thank you!
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8201_2301_01_10: Thank you so much! This is such a wonderful gift!
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8201_2301_02_10: I mean, just look! It’s so darn cute!
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8201_2402_01_10: That was fun! We should chat again sometime!
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8201_2401_01_10: I had SO much fun talking with you!
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
The cute things we found today are something we
can treasure together!
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
The decorations in this lodge are so darn cute,
I can hardly stand it!
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
And even though it’s already SO cute in here,
you redecorate, right?
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8001_0701_03_10:
Please tell me the next time you do! I’d love
to help!
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
Even if you think you can’t do something,
it’s important to try.
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
And even if you can’t do something on your own,
you can always get help from friends!
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
All the teachers and students at Pasio Academy
are such nice people...so let’s help each other as
we learn!
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8003_0701_01_10: It can be draining to have to indulge others.
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
But that doesn’t seem to be the case for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. I wonder why.
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
Even when adapting to someone else’s pace,
if anything, you seem to enjoy it!
ch0352_00_taro_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
You just jump right in and try to enjoy things
together. I guess I could learn a thing or two
from you.
